rows.label: tlk000007_msg0001
rows.name:
I'd like to board a ship heading
for the Superbian Empire...

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0002
rows.name: Are there any open spots?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0003
rows.name:
More than enough, mo.
Are you alone, Mo-mo?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0004
rows.name:
Um... I think it's roughly
six people or more...

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0005
rows.name:
Mo-mo-mo!? It's been a while
since we had a group, mo!

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0006
rows.name:
For groups, we have a special service,
mo. Everyone can ride as much as they
like for a total of 4,000G, mo.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0007
rows.name:
As you can see, I'm a salvager,
so I can ride for free, right?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0008
rows.name:
That is correct, mo. In that
case, I'll give you a discount.
It will be 3,000G, mo.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0009
rows.name: What? Can't we ride for free?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0010
rows.name:
Mo-mo-mo? How many people did
you say there were, Mo-mo?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0011
rows.name: Six or more, I think.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0012
rows.name:
And how many of them
are salvagers, Mo-mo?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0013
rows.name: Just me...

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0014
rows.name: And how many companions, Mo-mo?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0015
rows.name: A lot.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0016
rows.name:
Then I'd like you to
pay the 3,000G, mo.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0017
rows.name:
Murmur's pockets aren't
deep enough to transport a
whole group for free, mo.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0018
rows.name: Pay 3,000G?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0023
rows.name: Pay

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0024
rows.name: Don't pay

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0019
rows.name: Thank you for your business, mo!

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0020
rows.name:
Let me know when you want to
leave, mo. I'll depart when
your group is ready, mo!

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0021
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Nopon from the Avaritia Guild really
drive a hard bargain... The one in
Invidia gave me a deal...

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0022
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] No choice... I guess I'll
go back to the inn where
everyone's waiting.
